CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In order to corroborate the effect of the heteroatom substitution on charge transporting properties of the polymers , top - contact organic field - effect transistors ( OFETs ) were fabricated using solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT , respectively , as the semiconducting layer on the octadecyltrichlorosilane ( OTS ) self - assembled monolayer (SAM)-modified Si / SiO 2 substrates ( see the detailed devices fabrication in the Experimental Section ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PCDSeBT |
| octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS) |
| SAM-modified Si / SiO2 substrates |

Explanation:

1. PCDTBT: It is a type of polymer used as a semiconducting layer in the OFETs.
2. PCDSeBT: It is another type of polymer used as a semiconducting layer in the OFETs.
3. octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS): It is a chemical compound used as a self-assembled monolayer (SAM) modifier for the Si/SiO2 substrates.
4. SAM-modified Si / SiO2 substrates: It refers to the silicon and silicon dioxide substrates that have been modified with a self-assembled monolayer of octadecyltrichlorosilane.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PCDSeBT |
| octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS) |

Explanation:

1. PCDTBT: It is a type of polymer used as a semiconducting layer in the OFETs.
2. PCDSeBT: It is another type of polymer used as a semiconducting layer in the OFETs.
3. octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS): It is a chemical compound used as a self-assembled monolayer (SAM) modifier for the Si/SiO2 substrates.

The term "SAM-modified Si / SiO2 substrates" is not a material name, but rather a description of the substrate material that has been modified with a self-assembled monolayer (SAM) of octadecyltrichlorosilane. Therefore, it is not included in the table.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In order to corroborate the effect of the heteroatom substitution on charge transporting properties of the polymers , top - contact organic field - effect transistors ( OFETs ) were fabricated using solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT , respectively , as the semiconducting layer on the octadecyltrichlorosilane ( OTS ) self - assembled monolayer (SAM)-modified Si / SiO 2 substrates ( see the detailed devices fabrication in the Experimental Section ).

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| charge transporting properties |
| semiconducting layer |
| detailed devices fabrication |

The entities are identified as follows:

* "charge transporting properties" is a property of the polymers that is being investigated.
* "semiconducting layer" is a property of the materials used in the fabrication of the OFETs.
* "detailed devices fabrication" is a property of the process used to create the OFETs.

Note that "OFETs" and "SAM-modified Si / SiO2 substrates" are not included as entities because they are not properties. Instead, they are objects or components used in the experiment. Similarly, "heteroatom substitution" is not included as an entity because it is not mentioned in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After removing entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property", we have the following "Property Name" entity:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| semiconducting layer |

This is the only entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to a material property. The other entities, such as "charge transporting properties" and "detailed devices fabrication", are not material properties themselves, but rather properties that are being investigated or studied in the experiment.

Note that the entity "semiconducting layer" refers to a property of the materials used in the fabrication of the OFETs, specifically PCDTBT and PCDSeBT.
